Test Name: Red Blood Cell Membrane Disorders Gene Panel (Next-Generation Sequencing)
Specimen Type: Genomic DNA extracted from patient blood sample
Purpose: To identify mutations associated with hereditary red blood cell membrane disorders.
Container: Not specified (typically a blood collection tube such as EDTA for DNA extraction)
Equipment: NGS platform (e.g., Illumina or Ion Torrent), library preparation kit, sequencing reagents, bioinformatics software (e.g., BWA, GATK, Annovar), LIMS
